Description:
Model
Brand: Corsair
Name: K70 LUX
Model: CH-9101013-NA


Keyboard
Keyboard Interface: USB
Design Style: Gaming
Palm Rest: Detachable
Mechanical Keyboard: Yes
Key Switch Type: Cherry MX RGB Silent
Keyboard Color: Black
Dimensions: 1.53" x 17.20" x 6.60"
Backlit: Yes
Type: Wired


Mouse
Mouse Included: No


Features
Features: Aircraft-grade Anodized Brushed Aluminum Frame: The lightweight and rugged durability you need for a keyboard that’s going to see a lot of action

100% CHERRY MX Silent Keyswitches: Patented noise reduction technology makes key presses up to 30% quieter than other mechanical gaming keyboards

Multicolor Per-Key Dynamic Backlighting For Unlimited Game Customization: Pick a unique color and illumination level for each key for sophisticated keymaps and dramatic animations and effects

The Power of CUE: CORSAIR Utility Engine (CUE) software enables sophisticated macro programming and fast, fluid dynamic multicolor illumination for an enlightened gaming experience

USB Pass-Through Port: Positioned for uninterrupted game play and ready for your mouse or wireless headset adapter

100% Anti-Ghosting With Full Key Rollover On USB: Reliably accurate performance, no matter how fast you are

FPS and MOBA keycap sets: Textured and contoured keycaps provide maximum grip and enhanced feel


Package Contents
Package Contents: Corsair Gaming K70 LUX RGB MX SILENT Mechanical Keyboard, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide, FPS and MOBA keycap sets
Label: Teclado Corsair K70 LUX RGB Cherry Brown
